column4: is there a official channel for 10.04 support or is it here also?
+1 channel closed today, so 10.04 lucid is now supported in the main channel

i'd recommend you start a live cd and try reinstalling grub if you get no error at all -- i'm gonna pm you the grub2 factoid which explains the booting/chrooting stuff - and grub2 will automatically try to install the kernel stuff.  Good luck man.
